name: Hobo Days
description:
Hobo Days is my first Ludum Dare entry, game is completed in 48 hours by just me. Everything is created by me except the city ambient sound which is copyright free.

I hope you like it.

CONTROLS

Use Arrow keys to move

To ask for money, when walking beside a person (keep walking) press "B" then press "SPACE" to stop the power bar

press "S" to start the game

when you are in front of the vending machine press"F" to buy food (if you have enough money)
